name: Beauty Appointment App
description:
Hello, 


We are back with something new and interesting for you. Have you ever heard of a beauty appointment app? 


Yes, this design that you see is exclusively created keeping in mind all the beautiful women out there who love to pamper themselves with salon services. 


We have designed a dark-themed app with visible content for the users to have a user-friendly experience. 


If you are thinking of developing an app with such high-quality UI/UX, we have a team of creative designers ready to help you build the Uber for beauty app. 


Your suggestions are always welcomed. Don't forget to Like ‚ù§ it :)
